Class javachart.chart.StackAxis 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Axis
           |
           +----javachart.chart.StackAxis
public class StackAxis
extends Axis
implements AxisInterface

StackAxis(Dataset[], boolean, Plotarea)
Constructs an axis for the specified array of datasets

getMaxValsFromData(int)
Overrides Axis to base the axis maximum value on stacked datasets
getMinValsFromData(int)
Overrides Axis to base the Axis minimum on summed data at each data point.

StackAxis 
  public StackAxis(Dataset dsets[],
                   boolean xAxis,
                   Plotarea plt)
Constructs an axis for the specified array of datasets
Parameters:
dsets - Array of Dataset classes to consider
xAxis - true if this is an X axis
plt - The Plotarea bounded by this Axis

getMaxValsFromData 
  protected double getMaxValsFromData(int nmsets)
Overrides Axis to base the axis maximum value on stacked datasets
Parameters:
nmsets - Number of datasets
Returns:
Highest value of the sum
Overrides:
getMaxValsFromData in class Axis
getMinValsFromData 
  protected double getMinValsFromData(int nmsets)
Overrides Axis to base the Axis minimum on summed data at each data point.
Parameters:
nmsets - Number of datasets
Returns:
Lowest value of the sum
Overrides:
getMinValsFromData in class Axis
